name: Mortal Island 0.5
description:
Explore a dark island using platforming and various upgrades you get along the way. Intended as a short (1-2 hour long) game used as practice for a future commercial project. Controller highly recommended.

Gamepad/Keyboard Controls:
Move - D-Pad/Arrow Keys

Menu - Start/Enter
Map - Select/Tab
Full Screen - F11

(After gaining upgrades)

Jump - A/Space
Bow - X/Ctrl
Torch - Y/S
Mount - B/D
Reflect - R/A
